mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(clt.CLT_NAME, '(', clt.CLT_NO, ')') AS CLT_NAME , CONCAT(clt.CLT_RPR, ' 원장') AS CLT_RPR , clt.CLT_RPR_CNT , cd.CD_SHP_ADDR , cd.CD_SHP_DEST , brnc.BRNC_NAME , CONCAT(emp.EMP_NAME, ' ', emp.EMP_PST) AS EMP_NAME , emp.EMP_CNT FROM TB_CLT clt JOIN TB_CLT_DTL cd ON clt.CLT_NO = cd.CLT_NO JOIN TB_EMP emp ON clt.EMP_ID = emp.EMP_ID JOIN TB_BRNC brnc ON emp.BRNC_CODE = brnc.BRNC_CODE WHERE clt.CLT_NO = #{clientNo} GROUP BY clt.CLT_NO

SELECT ord.ORD_NO , ord.ORD_SHP_CAT , DATE_FORMAT(ord.ORD_DT, '%m-%d %H:%i') AS ORD_DT , itm.ITM_NAME , orditm.ITM_CODE , vnd.V_NAME , orditm.OI_QTY , IF(pic.OI_NO IS NOT NULL, pic.PIC_QTY, csp.CSP_DLV_QTY) AS PIC_QTY , IF(ri.OI_NO IS NOT NULL, '완료', '미완료') AS RI_COM , rls.RLS_IVC_CODE , ord.ORD_SHP_ADDR FROM TB_ORD ord RIGHT JOIN TB_ORD_ITM orditm ON ord.ORD_NO = orditm.ORD_NO JOIN TB_ITM itm ON itm.ITM_CODE = orditm.ITM_CODE JOIN TB_VND vnd ON itm.V_NO = vnd.V_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PIC pic ON pic.OI_NO = orditm.OI_NO LEFT JOIN TB_CMB_SHP_PTN csp ON csp.OI_NO = orditm.OI_NO LEFT JOIN TB_RLS_INSP ri ON ri.OI_NO = orditm.OI_NO LEFT JOIN TB_RLS rls ON rls.ORD_NO = ord.ORD_NO WHERE ord.ORD_NO = #{orderNo}

select clt.CLT_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(ord.ORD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ORD_DT , orditm.ITM_CODE , COUNT(orditm.ITM_CODE) - 1 AS CNT_ITM , SUM(orditm.OI_QTY) AS OI_QTY , ord.ORD_NO , ord.ORD_ORD_WAY , DATE_FORMAT(rls.RLS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RLS_DT from TB_ORD ord JOIN TB_CLT clt ON ord.CLT_NO = clt.CLT_NO RIGHT JOIN TB_ORD_ITM orditm ON ord.ORD_NO = orditm.ORD_NO LEFT JOIN TB_RLS rls ON ord.ORD_NO = rls.ORD_NO WHERE clt.CLT_NO = #{clientNo} AND ord.ORD_NO != #{orderNo} GROUP BY ord.ORD_NO ORDER BY ORD_DT DESC

select itm.ITM_NAME , orditm.ITM_CODE , orditm.OI_QTY from TB_ORD ord RIGHT JOIN TB_ORD_ITM orditm ON ord.ORD_NO = orditm.ORD_NO JOIN TB_ITM itm ON orditm.ITM_CODE = itm.ITM_CODE WHERE ord.ORD_NO = #{orderNo}
